pages.text: $(bgreen)Tangle Kelp$() thinks that it will hide below the surface and nobody will see it, but its friends say they can see it perfectly well, but it'll never change.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)25$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)close attack$() plant, which will drag a zombie into water and deal damage to it$().
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will summon $(l)several tangle kelp$().
